definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out

sentences.english: Then, you're gonna fold it in half once, lengthwise, lining up the edges, and really pressing down the seam.
sentences.chinese: 然后，你要把它沿纵向对折，边缘对齐，并压平接缝。

sentences.english: The aligned phrasal structure groups are post-processed as the translation templates.
sentences.chinese: 对齐的结果经过后处理就可以得到翻译的模板。

sentences.english: Aligns a paragraph to the left, right, or center.
It was also a black-letter day for the whole world.
sentences.chinese: 此日对齐世界浑实来道也是不利的一天。

sentences.english: Effects of different numerical techniques on phenetic classification of Mosla complex (Labiatae) at population level.
sentences.chinese: 不同表示方法对齐宁族群外表型分类之影响。

sentences.english: Through code AS, align the MovieClips…
sentences.chinese: 通过代码，对齐影片剪辑。

sentences.english: Bitext is text from mutually translated text that is aligned into related segments.
sentences.chinese: 双语文本来自对齐到相关片段的相互翻译文本。

sentences.english: The base address or the file offset specified does not have the proper alignment.
sentences.chinese: 指定的基址或文件偏移量没有适当对齐。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on extracting translation pairs from unaligned Chinese English bilingual corpora.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究基于未对齐的汉英双语库翻译对抽取。

sentences.english: The members of the structure or union are aligned based on their widest member.
sentences.chinese: 结构或联合的成员是根据最宽的成员进行对齐的。

sentences.english: Note that the default platform alignment will always pack identical types contiguously.
sentences.chinese: 请注意默认平台的对齐方式将总是连续打包相同类型。

sentences.english: This will straighten your neck and back, and bring them into alignment.
sentences.chinese: 这样能够拉直您的颈部和背部，使它们对齐成一线。

sentences.english: Disscusing the algorithm of alignment of mult-version point cloud by coordinate transformation theory.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了利用坐标变换理论对多视点云数据对齐的算法。

sentences.english: Position weatherstrip on flange aligning notches in each corner.
sentences.chinese: 将防水饰条安放在与每个角落刻痕对齐的凸缘上。

sentences.english: Use the four corners of the net to align it parallel to the plane you like to correct.
sentences.chinese: 使用网的四个角来与你想纠正的面平行对齐。

sentences.english: However, labels with left aligned labels are anecdotally clearer.
sentences.chinese: 然而，标签左对齐通常被认为传达信息更清晰。

definition: to sew together/suture (in surgery)/to sew up (a wound)
vertical/to erect/to set upright/vertical stroke in Chinese characters/young servant (old)
checked pattern/square box character (in Chinese text) indicating illegible character
welt seam (doubled over and sewed again from topside)
to sell at a 50% discount/to fold in two
